alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 6:50PM CST until January 17 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake For the Pine Island Bayou...including Sour Lake...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday evening at 700 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Water inundates roads in lowland areas near the river. Low spots on Old Sour Lake Road are under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:01 PM CST Friday the stage was 25.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:01 PM CST Friday was 25.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.4 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 25.4 feet on 11/09/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Pine Island Bayou Sour Lake 25.0 25.2 Fri 6 pm CST 25.4 24.9 24.2 &&
